Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Ionian cup with somewhat convex everted rim; glaze fired mostly red-brown; white slip; interior glazed with traces of added white maeander band running left between two white bands; exterior: band of inverted rays on rim; trace of undetermined decoration in handle zone.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1903) (phase 2)
